dr.evomodel.substmodel
Class ComplexSubstitutionModel

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.substmodel.AbstractSubstitutionModel
          dr.evomodel.substmodel.ComplexSubstitutionModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
SubstitutionModel, Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GLMSubstitutionModel, MicrosatelliteModel, SVSComplexSubstitutionModel
public class ComplexSubstitutionModel
extends AbstractSubstitutionModel
implements Likelihood

A general irreversible class for any data type; allows complex eigenstructures.

Author:
Marc Suchard
See Also:
Serialized Form

handleVariableChangedEvent

protected void handleVariableChangedEvent(Variable variable,
                                          int index,
                                          Variable.ChangeType type)
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
This method is called whenever a parameter is changed.

It is strongly recommended that the model component sets a "dirty" flag and does no further calculations. Recalculation is typically done when the model component is asked for some information that requires them. This mechanism is 'lazy' so that this method can be safely called multiple times with minimal computational cost.

Overrides:
handleVariableChangedEvent in class AbstractSubstitutionModel
